description: A spicy condiment or side with intense flavours balanced by fresh coconut.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Coconut Sambal Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Using a pestle and mortar, grind the dried chillies, shallots and onion.
Transfer to a bowl and add the sugar, salt and lime juice and combine fully.
Lastly add the grated coconut and combine fully before serving.
